metadata.title: Why Write?
metadata.imageAlt: Pencil in space with words surrounding it on the theme of, "Why Write?"
metadata.imageCaption: There are more written words than there are stars in our galaxy.
metadata.preview: Regrets over coding until 4 a.m., irregularities in my bowel movements, or words that earned me a smile today are words that roll right off the tip of my fingers for a journal entry. Unfortunately, what's easy to write in my journal isn't incredibly useful to a stranger on the internet.
